thread.title: Facebook’s site now allows adding filters, stickers, text to photos
thread.title_full: Facebook’s site now allows adding filters, stickers, text to photos | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Facebook’s site now allows adding filters, stickers, text to photos
text:
Facebook has released a new feature on the web the allowed the users to add filters, stickers and text to photos when uploading them.
Earlier this year, this feature was released on the phone.
According to The Next Web, when the users are uploading a picture on Facebook main site they will now see a paint brush as well as photo tagging if they move the pointer over it. When the users click on it the paint brush opens an edit overlay which is full of new options.
The users can add one of six filters, crop it and add text or stickers to their photo.
All the users’ stickers from mobile are synced across and the feature functions in largely the same way.
First Published on August 29, 2015 6:30 am
